description:
Chopper sets sail for Alabasta with his new friends, and Dalton thinks back to his first meeting with Princess Vivi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Au revoir, Drum Island ! Je prends la mer
Goodbye Drum Island! I`m Going Out to Sea!
Sayonara Drum-tou! Boku wa Umi e Deru!
Прощай, Барабанный Остров! Я отправляюсь в море!
ลาก่อนเกาะดรัม พวกผมจะออกทะเลแล้วนะ
さよならドラム島! 僕は海へ出る!
